E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 6/18/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Larry Herndon



Date: Wednesday, 6/25/1990
Subject: Jose Rijo is sick...
Diagnosis: Migraine.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 7/10/1990
Subject: Jaime Cocanower healing process
Jaime Cocanower is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
